pullRequest.title: Use "int" instead of "long" on "rhn_check" for either Python 2 or 3
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?
This PR just make rhn_check to always use int for both Python 2 and 3. That way we align this code with the changes made by #2025
GUI diff
No difference.

 DONE

No documentation needed: internal changes


 DONE

commit.message: Use int instead of long for either Python 2 or 3

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -359,7 +358,7 @@ def __build_status_report():
                 pass
 
         # We need to fit into xmlrpc's integer limits
-        if status_report['uptime'][1] > long(2)**31-1:
+        if status_report['uptime'][1] > int(2)**31-1:
